short_summary: PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada is issuing this Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the acquisition and installation of door hardware for Archambault Institution located in Sainte-Anne Des Plaines, Quebec.
description: Standing Offer for door hardware for Archambault Institution.
full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Door Hardware

#### Tender Details

* **Title**: Invitation to Standing Offer for Door Hardware - Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) - Archambault Institution
* **Reference Number**: WS4436200895-Doc4445897235
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category**: Government Decentralized
* **UNSPSC Code**: 46171503 - Lock sets

#### Bidding Details

* **Closing Date and Time**: April 30, 2024, 2:00:00 PM (14:00:00) Eastern Time
* **Status**: Expiring

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is issuing a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the acquisition and installation of door hardware for the Archambault Institution located in Sainte-Anne des Plaines, Quebec.

#### Terms and Conditions

* The procurement method is open to all interested suppliers.
* Trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contact Information

* **Primary Contact**: Annie Blanchet (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice Website**: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19353591?extsite=MTkzNTM1OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Requirements and Deliverables

The offer will be evaluated on the basis of the commodities identified in the Invitation to Standing Offer document, Annex A. Selection criteria: Not applicable. The following is a summary of the Invitation to Standing Offer document:
